description.string:
It is an introductory type of lesson. Students are familiarized with such notions like: an opposite vector, the addition of vectors, the subtraction of vectors, the alternation of addition law, the multiplication of a vector and a number. Students work in pairs. They have an access to computers as well as the internet and together follow the presented animation. Later they perform commands according to the instructions on the website. In the second part of the lesson students write down on the blackboard and then in their notebooks laws and properties they have just discovered.
Expected effects: - a student can add and subtract two vectors - a student can formulate and write down the laws concerning operations on vectors - a student can multiply a vector and a number and later he/she can explain the relation between the number and the vector’s length by ratio of the initial vector - a student understands and can use, without any problems, the notion of a vector.
